[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@gnaudio/jabra-js](./jabra-js.md) &gt; [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md)

## IDevice interface

Describes all the properties of a physical Jabra device along with methods for basic device communication via HID or GNP.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface IDevice 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [browserLabel](./jabra-js.idevice.browserlabel.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string | Retrieves the full access label of the device. This is a stringified version of [IDevice.vendorId](./jabra-js.idevice.vendorid.md) and [IDevice.productId](./jabra-js.idevice.productid.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [connectionAdded](./jabra-js.idevice.connectionadded.md) |  | Observable&lt;[IConnection](./jabra-js.iconnection.md)<!-- -->&gt; | An observable which emits whenever the device receives a new connection that can be used for communicating with the device. |
|  [connectionList](./jabra-js.idevice.connectionlist.md) |  | Observable&lt;[IConnection](./jabra-js.iconnection.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt; | An observable which emits all existing connections with a device whenever there are any changes with a connection, whether it is a new one or a disconnected one. |
|  [connectionRemoved](./jabra-js.idevice.connectionremoved.md) |  | Observable&lt;[IConnection](./jabra-js.iconnection.md)<!-- -->&gt; | An observable which emits whenever an existing connection with the device has disconnected. If it was the last existing connection, [IDevice.onDisconnect](./jabra-js.idevice.ondisconnect.md) will also emit. |
|  [currentConnections](./jabra-js.idevice.currentconnections.md) |  | [IConnection](./jabra-js.iconnection.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Retrieves a list of the currently available connections. |
|  [id](./jabra-js.idevice.id.md) |  | [DeviceId](./jabra-js.deviceid.md) | The ID of the device. |
|  [name](./jabra-js.idevice.name.md) |  | string | The name of the device, e.g. "Jabra Evolve2 40". |
|  [onDisconnect](./jabra-js.idevice.ondisconnect.md) |  | Observable&lt;void&gt; | Emits when the device gets disconnected. |
|  [productId](./jabra-js.idevice.productid.md) |  | number | The product ID of the device, e.g. 3648, or '0e40' for Jabra Evolve2 40. |
|  [serialNumber](./jabra-js.idevice.serialnumber.md) |  | string | The serial number of the device. |
|  [type](./jabra-js.idevice.type.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [DeviceType](./jabra-js.devicetype.md) | The device type, e.g. headset, dongle, etc. |
|  [vendorId](./jabra-js.idevice.vendorid.md) |  | number | The vendor ID of the device. Should be the Jabra vendor ID, i.e. 2830, or '0b0e' |
